creditline: Gift of funds from Bob Mersky and the Contemporary Art Affinity Group
description: abstract image; arcs and jagged forms with sketchy dry-brush black lines; low-relief painted collage elements; irregular colored formed--greens and yellows primarily in ULQ; oranges, blues and greens in LLQ; blues and reds along right edge
marks: Signature, Date Signed and dated on verso: [Iva Gueorguieva 2013]
medium: Acrylic, collage and oil stick on canvas
title: Gathered Hiss
